Package com.credenceid.biometrics

Interface Biometrics.OnFingerprintGrabbedListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Biometrics
    public static interface Biometrics.OnFingerprintGrabbedListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when a request to Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) or Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, boolean, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) returns with result.s

    NOTE: This listener type WILL ONLY work with Biometrics.ScanType.SINGLE_FINGER. Using any other type of Biometrics.ScanType will result in an immediate Biometrics.ResultCode.FAIL.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onCloseFingerprintReader​(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode, Biometrics.CloseReasonCode reasonCode)
      Invoked when a request to Biometrics.closeFingerprintReader() returns with result or fingerprint reader closes for any other Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
      void onFingerprintGrabbed​(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, byte[] iso, java.lang.String filepath, java.lang.String status)
      Invoked when a request to Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) or Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, boolean, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) returns with a result.

    • Method Detail

      • onFingerprintGrabbed

        void onFingerprintGrabbed​(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode,
                          android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                          byte[] iso,
                          java.lang.String filepath,
                          java.lang.String status)
        Invoked when a request to Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) or Biometrics.grabFingerprint(ScanType, boolean, OnFingerprintGrabbedListener) returns with a result. This method is invoked multiple times during lifecycle of fingerprint capture.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Biometrics.ResultCode.OK if fingerprint was successfully captured. Biometrics.ResultCode.FAIL} if fingerprint reader could not be opened or failed to capture finger. Biometrics.ResultCode.INTERMEDIATE} is returned continuously for as long as fingerprint capture does not finish.
        bitmap - Bitmap image of scanned fingerpint. This will be a valid image in both Biometrics.ResultCode.INTERMEDIATE} and Biometrics.ResultCode.OK.
        iso - FingerprintRecord data in ISO FMC COMPACT format. Null if unable to provide ISO format.
        filepath - Pathname of bitmap file after capture, Biometrics.ResultCode.OK. File is not guaranteed to exist after capture completes.
        status - Text indicating operations progress. Some sample statuses that may be returned are as follows.
        Sample hints.
        Opening fingerprint...
        Place finger on sensor...
        Failed to open fingerprint sensor.

      • onCloseFingerprintReader

        void onCloseFingerprintReader​(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode,
                              Biometrics.CloseReasonCode reasonCode)
        Invoked when a request to Biometrics.closeFingerprintReader() returns with result or fingerprint reader closes for any other Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Biometrics.ResultCode.OK if fingerprint reader was successfully closed. Biometrics.ResultCode.FAIL} if fingerprint reader failed to close. Biometrics.ResultCode.INTERMEDIATE} this code is never returned for this API.
        reasonCode - See Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
